description:
With a no questions asked, full, 30 day guaranteed 100% refund there is nothing to lose.

THE PRICE OF THIS COURSE WILL INCREASE TO $27 SOON

If you are truly looking to make huge money then you are in the right spot!

Every day, people make thousands of dollars with this information and you can too! We are all the same, just a little bit of knowledge is all that separates us! I will teach you all that missing knowledge on the inside!

What is a mailing list and why would I even want one?...

You are probably on many email lists right now! They are just a list of contacts that you can send promotional emails to. The reason why this is important is because once you have a good list, you can make $1,000+ per email! A guy I know averages a little over $2,200 dollars per email and he sends 10-12 emails per week! You don't have to be a genius to realize how huge this opportunity is!

Isn't it hard to get people on your email list?

NO! With the methods taught in this course, you can have a large and wildly profitable email list in no time!

What will we be learning in this course:

  • Easily select a profitable niche
  • Pick a product to promote (you won't even make it!)
  • Build your list with a free giveaway! (again, you won't even make it)
  • Make a squeeze page (easy and free)
  • Create your email list
  • Multiple secret ways to build your list (these tips are worth thousands!)
  • Get easy subscribers for free!
  • And MUCH more!

I did not make all of these videos as a fellow internet marketer and I collaborated to make this course (he is not part of udemy). This collaboration makes for some great learning with above and beyond information! All the videos have great content and valuable information and I want to share them with you all. Watch my first preview video and I will explain it all!

You don't need to be a genius to tell that this is a HUGE opportunity and you really need to take action now so go hit that enroll button!

I'll see you on the inside!

-Andrew
title: Email Marketing: Build a massive Email List
